context_of_use: This use case allows customers to browse, search, view product details, and add products to their cart within the e-commerce platform.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to find and purchase products easily
description: Enables customers to browse, search, view product details, and add products to their cart.
preconditions: Customer is logged into the system.
postconditions: Customer has successfully browsed products and added items to the cart.
assumptions: The customer has an active account and is logged in.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to browse products by category.
The system shall allow customers to search for products by keyword.
The system shall allow customers to view product details.
The system shall allow customers to add products to their cart.
main_flow: 1. Customer browses products by category → System displays products in the selected category.
2. Customer searches for products by keyword → System displays search results matching the keyword.
3. Customer views product details → System shows detailed information about the selected product.
4. Customer adds products to cart → System confirms the product has been added to the cart.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 2): If no products match the search keyword, then System displays a message indicating no results found.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the system fails to load products, then System displays an error message and prompts the customer to try again.
